$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Is this heaven? Look at these huge
flower blossoms... It's paradise!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|Please take this seriously, Sylvain.$k$p$nMPID_レア|What a fine instructor you are.
Firm, yet gentle.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Lady Rhea, Professor...you're both
far too kind, if you don't mind my
saying. I'd have left him behind.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Unthinkable! My daring deeds
need witnesses! Let's go!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|They're strong... Let's retreat
and regroup.$k$p$Sbs150|
